name: ReactNativePrepare
description: Prep a React Native project to avoid build hangs for iOS and to use the right version of Node.js when generating an offline bundle.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: xcodeProject
inputs.label: Xcode Project(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root to the Xcode project file(s).  These are patched to use the correct version of node.

inputs.name: reactGradle
inputs.label: react.gradle Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root to the react.gradle file(s).  These are patched to use the correct version of node.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory for command runs. Typically the location of your package.json file and is used to find the react-native node module. Defaults to the root of the repository.
